CustomField.description: Indicates that a payment is being made to the payee after their P45 has been issued and the user has decided whether to apply the irregular payment rules to the payment, or not.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates that a payment is being made to the payee after their P45 has been issued and the user has decided whether to apply the irregular payment rules to the payment, or not.
CustomField.label: UK NI Apply Irregular Earnings
